name: World Hunter
description:
Experience the realism of international hunting with World Hunter. Pursue Bighorn Sheep, Whitetail Deer, doves and coyotes. Hunt Winter or Fall seasons in the rugged rocky mountains of New Mexico, the Canadian Rockies, and the exquisite Cordoba region of Argentina. Select gear choices in the virtual hunting lodge where a variety of firearms, camouflage clothing and ammunition are available. Competitive and simulation mode offer two different styles of game play. Competitive mode is faster paced and more shooter oriented. In simulation mode the objective is to harvest the big buck or ram. More patience and understanding of animal behavior is required to be successful in this mode of play. Animations and graphics of animals is based on true to life video and pictures!

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
